data.prayer: Father, help your children in Zlínský, Czechia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zlínský, Czechia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 4,355 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Zlínský.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Zlínský, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 154,190 cultural Christians in the state of Zlínský to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Czech-speaking people might believe through him.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Zlínský, Czechia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Zlínský, Czechia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, encourage the church in Zlínský, Czechia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
